content: Yeah, I think I'll start with the meditation apps and see which one I like best. I'm hoping to reduce my stress and anxiety levels, and I've heard that meditation can really help with that. I'll also ask Rachel about her favorite resources and classes, that's a great idea. By the way, do you know if there's a connection between Buddhism and astrology? I recently attended a lecture on astrology and spirituality, and it made me wonder if there's a link between the two.
